title: Nature and Environment
sentences: Mañana vamos a subir a la
Tomorrow we are going to climb the highest mountain in the region.
The river water is very clean and cold.
hace mucho calor durante el día.
In the desert it is very hot during the day.
Hay muchos árboles y animales diferentes en el
There are many different trees and animals in the forest.
es inmenso y tiene mucha vida marina.
The ocean is immense and has a lot of marine life.
We live on an island in the middle of the sea.
Me encanta pasar tiempo en la
I love spending time in nature.
It is very important to protect the environment.
There is a lot of pollution in the big cities.
el papel y el plástico en casa.
We must recycle paper and plastic at home.
Don't throw the trash on the ground, please.
las plantas del jardín esta tarde.
I have to water the garden plants this afternoon.
The flowers smell very good in spring.
The climate is changing very fast lately.
del campo es mucho más puro que el de la ciudad.
The country air is much purer than the city air.
en esta zona es muy buena para cultivar.
The land/soil in this area is very good for farming.
Mis abuelos tienen una casa pequeña en el
My grandparents have a small house in the countryside.
The village is in a valley between two mountains.
amazónica es el pulmón del mundo.
The Amazon jungle is the lung of the world.
todavía está activo y es peligroso.
That volcano is still active and it is dangerous.
I like to collect stones of different colors.
Glaciers are made of very ancient ice.
We have to take care of the planet for the future.
para calentar el agua de la casa.
We use solar energy to heat the house's water.
Venus is the hottest planet in our system.
